dialogStrings:
You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.
Nibel Reactor(Int.)
Mt. Nibel
Nibel Reactor
Mt. Nibel Cave
Mansion, 2f.
Mansion, Basement
Mansion, 1f.
Received "Destruct" Materia!
Received "Twin Viper"!
Received "Gold M-phone"!
Received "Enemy Launcher"!
Received "Magic Source"!
Received "Counter" Materia!
Received "Powersoul"!
Received "All" Materia!
Received "Sniper CR"!
Received "Elemental" Materia!
Received "Elixir"!
Received "Odin" Materia!

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

I have a bad feeling about this
Open the safe
Don't open it
{CHOICE}
{CHOICE}
Success
Fail
Received Key Item "Key to the Basement"!

{Tifa}
We finally made it.
We sure took the long way though.

{Cloud}
{Tifa}, you wait here.

{Tifa}
I'm going inside, too!
I wanna see!

Sephiroth
Only authorized people are allowed in.
This place is full of
Shinra's industrial secrets.

{Tifa}
But!

Sephiroth
Take care of the lady.

{Tifa}
Mm, man!

{Tifa}
Better take real
good care of me then!

{Tifa}
Yeah, I remember.

{Tifa}
Hmmso it was you?

{Cloud}
This isJenova, right?
It won't open

Sephiroth
This is the reason for the malfunction.
This part is broken.{PAUSE}{Cloud}, close the valve.

Sephiroth
Did you close the valve?

Sephiroth
Why did it break?

Sephiroth
Now I see, Hojo.{PAUSE}But doing this will never
put you on the same level
as Professor Gast.

Sephiroth
This is a system that condenses and
freezes the Mako energy
that is, when it's working correctly.{PAUSE}Nowwhat does Mako energy become
when it's further condensed?

{Cloud}
Uh, ummOh yeah!
It becomes a Materia.

Sephiroth
Right, normally.
But Hojo put something else in there.
Take a look.

Sephiroth
Look through the window.

{Cloud}
Whwhat is that!?

Sephiroth
Normal members of SOLDIER are humans
that have been showered with Mako.{PAUSE}You're different from the others
but still human.{PAUSE}But, what are they?
They've been exposed to a far
higher degree of Mako than you.

{Cloud}
Is this some kind of monster?

Sephiroth
Exactly.
And it's Hojo of Shinra
that produced these monsters.{PAUSE}Mutated living organisms produced
by Mako energy.
That's what these monsters
really are.

{Cloud}
Normal members of SOLDIER?
You mean you're different?

{Cloud}
Hhey, Sephiroth!

Sephiroth
No

Sephiroth
Was I?

Sephiroth
Was I created this way too?

{Cloud}
Sephiroth.

Sephiroth
Am I the same as all these monsters?

Sephiroth
You saw it!
All of themwere humans

{Cloud}
Human!? No way!

Sephiroth
Ever since I was small I've felt{PAUSE}that I was different from the others.
Special, in some way.

Sephiroth
But
not like this
Am Ihuman?

I didn't quite understand
what Sephiroth was saying
at that time.

I was even more surprised that
Shinra was producing monsters.

{Tifa}
Hey! It's {Cloud}!

{Cloud}
ZackZack.
Zack

{Tifa}
You remembered!!

{Tifa}
That's right!
It was Zack who came to Nibelheim
with Sephiroth!

{Tifa}
Then, where were you, {Cloud}?

{Tifa}
{Cloud}
Did yousee it all?

{Cloud}
I saweverything

Sephiroth
Aaarrrghwhowho are you?

Mom
{Tifa}My towngive it back

I had so much respect for you
I admired you

{Tifa}
{Cloud}!?

{Tifa}
That's what happened

{Tifa}
You were there.

{Tifa}
You were watching me.

{Tifa}
You came.
You kept your promise.

{Tifa}
So you really did come when I was in trouble!

{Cloud}
Sorry
I didn't get theresooner

{Tifa}
It's all right{Cloud}.

Sephiroth
Just like you.

Zack
{Cloud}
Kill Sephiroth

Information concerning Materia/Hojo
{CHOICE} Read it
{CHOICE} Ignore

Life of Materia{PAUSE}{CHOICE} Read it
{CHOICE} Ignore

{CHOICE} Ignore

/Hojo{PAUSE}{CHOICE} Read it

The Promised Land{PAUSE}{CHOICE} Read it

Sephiroth
An apparently dead organism
was found in a 2000 year old
geological stratum.

Sephiroth
Professor Gast named that organism, Jenova

Sephiroth
X Year, X Month, X Day.
Jenova confirmed to be an Ancient

Sephiroth
X Year, X Month, X Day.
Jenova Project approved.
The use of Mako Reactor 1 approved for use

Sephiroth
My mother's name is Jenova
Jenova Project
Is this just a coincidence?

Sephiroth
Professor Gast
Why didn't you tell me anything?
Why did you die?

Sephiroth
Let me be alone.
Ha, ha, ha, ha!

Sephiroth didn't come
out of the Shinra Mansion

He continued to read as
if he were possessed by something,
and not once, did the light
in the basement go out

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, ha

Sephiroth
Who is it!?

Sephiroth
Hmphtraitor.

{Cloud}
Traitor?

Sephiroth
You ignorant traitor.
I'll tell you.{PAUSE}This Planet originally belonged to the Cetra.
Cetra was a itinerant race.
They would migrate in,
settle the Planet, then move on{PAUSE}At the end of their harsh,
hard journey, it was said
they would find the Promised Land
and supreme happiness.

Sephiroth
But, those who disliked journeying appeared.
They stopped their migrations,
built shelters and elected to
lead an easier life.{PAUSE}They took that which the Cetra
and the Planet had made without
giving back one whit in return!

Sephiroth
Those are your ancestors.

{Cloud}
Sephiroth

Sephiroth
Long ago, disaster struck the Planet.

Sephiroth
Your ancestors escaped
They survived because they hid.

Sephiroth
The Planet was saved
by sacrificing the Cetra.
After that, your ancestors
continued to multiply.

Sephiroth
Now all that's left of the Cetra
is in these reports.

{Cloud}
What does that have to do with you?

Sephiroth
Don't you see?

Sephiroth
An Ancient named Jenova was found in
a 2000 year-old geological stratum.

Sephiroth
The Jenova Project.

Sephiroth
The Jenova Project wanted to produce people
with the powers of the Ancients
Or, the Cetra.

Sephiroth
I am what was produced.

{Cloud}
Prproduced!?

Sephiroth
Yes.{PAUSE}Professor Gast, leader of
the Jenova Project and genius
scientist, produced me.

{Cloud}
Howhow did he?

{Cloud}
SeSephiroth?

Sephiroth
Out of my way.
I'm going to see my mother.

Sephiroth
Mother, I'm here to see you.
Please, open this door.

{Tifa}
How could you do that to Papa and
all the townspeople?

{Tifa}
You promised
You promised that you'd come
when I was in trouble

Sephiroth
Mother, let's take the Planet
back together.{PAUSE}I've thought of a great idea.
Let's go to the Promised Land.

{Cloud}
Sephiroth

{Cloud}
My family! My hometown!
How could you do this to them!?

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, ha
They've come again, Mother.

Sephiroth
With her superior power, knowledge,
and magic,
Mother was destined to become
the ruler of this Planet.

Sephiroth
But, they{PAUSE}These worthless ones,
took the Planet from you.
Didn't they, Mother?

Sephiroth
But, don't be sad anymore.

{Cloud}
What about MY sadness!?
My familyfriends?
The sadness of having my hometown
taken away from me!?{PAUSE}It's the same as your sadness!

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, hamy sadness?
What do I have to be sad about?{PAUSE}I am the chosen one.
I have been chosen
to be the leader of this Planet.

Sephiroth
I have orders to take the Planet back
from you stupid people for the Cetra.
What should I be sad about?

{Cloud}
Sephiroth
I trusted you

{Cloud}
No, you're not the Sephiroth I used to know!

{Cloud}
What's this?

{Tifa}
A mysteriously colored cave

Sephiroth
It must be the Mako energy.
This mountain is especially abundant in it.
That's why the Mako Reactor was built here.

{Cloud}
And what's this?

Sephiroth
A Mako fountain.
It's a miracle of nature.

{Tifa}
It's so beautiful

{Tifa}
If the Mako Reactor continues to
suck up the energy,
this fountain will dry up too

Sephiroth
Materia.
When you condense Mako energy,
Materia is produced.{PAUSE}It's very rare to see Materia
in its natural state.

{Cloud}
By the way
Why is it that when you use Materia
you can also use magic too?

Sephiroth
You were in SOLDIER and
didn't even know that?

Sephiroth
the knowledge and wisdom of the Ancients
is held in the Materia.

Sephiroth
Anyone with this knowledge can freely
use the powers of the land and the Planet.
That knowledge interacts between
ourselves and the Planet
calling up magicor so they say.

{Cloud}
Magica mysterious power

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, ha !

{Cloud}
Did I say somethin' funny?

Sephiroth
A man once told me never to use unscientific
terms like 'mysterious power'!
It shouldn't even be called 'magic'!{PAUSE}I still remember how angry he was.

{Cloud}
Who was that?

Sephiroth
Hojo of Shinra, Inc.
An inexperienced man assigned
to take over the work of a great scientist.{PAUSE}He was a walking mass of complexes.

{Tifa}
A Mako fountain
So this is where the knowledge
of the Ancients is.

{Cloud}
Sephiroth!

Sephiroth
Being here brings back memories.

Sephiroth
Are you going to participate in the Reunion?

{Cloud}
I don't even know what a Reunion is!

Sephiroth
Jenova will be at the Reunion.
Jenova will join the Reunion,
becoming a calamity from the skies.

{Cloud}
Jenova, a calamity from the skies?
You mean she wasn't an Ancient!?

Sephiroth
I see.
I don't think you have the right to participate.{PAUSE}I will go {CYAN}North past Mt. Nibel{WHITE}.
If you wish to knowthen follow

{Cloud}
Reunion?
Calamity from the skies?

I must get rid of all those
that stand in the way of my research.
Even that one from the Turks.{PAUSE}I scientifically altered him
and put him to sleep in the basement.
If you want to find him, search the area.{PAUSE}Butthis is merely a game I thought of.
It is not necessary
for you to participate
if you don't want to.{PAUSE}There seems to be another letter.
Read it
Ignore it

Move the dial on the safe carefully
but quickly. You have 20 seconds.
You can not go past the numbers while turning.
The 4 hints for the numbers are{PAUSE} dial (1)
dial (2)
dial (3)
The lid of the box with the most oxygen.
Behind the Ivory's short of tea and ray.

The creek in the floor near the chair
on the second floor
then to the left five steps, up nine steps,
left two steps, and up six steps.

The fourth row has been written in invisible ink
Dial (4) is {GREEN} (Right 97)

Look, something is written on the back
Look at the back
Ignore

You still don't get it?
Don't give up if you've only checked it once.
You have to be persistent.

Look, this letter could be in invisible ink.
{CHOICE} Read it
{CHOICE} Ignore it

There are four things in this mansion
Check more closely.

Something is written on the back of the lid.

Something is written on the back of the lid.
{CHOICE} {GREEN} (1) Right 36

There's a carving in the floor.
{CHOICE} {GREEN}(2) Left 10

There's a carving in the floor.
{CHOICE} {GREEN} (3) Right 59

Something is written on the back of the lid.
